TOURNAMENT HOWTO:

1. Tournament folder needs to be empty! (only agents.xml inside. delete all rest)
2. agents should be extracted from eclipse as runnable jars and with all external jars extracted to the final runnable jar
3. agents.xml should look like that
<agents>
	<!-- An auto-generated list of agents and their behavior classes -->
	<!--  - jar directory : ./agents/ -->
	<!--  - generated on  : Mon Nov 20 14:20:45 CET 2017 -->
	<agent name="auctionAgent">
		<set class-path="./agents/auctionAgent.jar"/>
		<set class-name="template.AuctionTemplate"/>
	</agent>
	<agent name="auctionDummy">
		<set class-path="./agents/auctionDummy.jar"/>
		<set class-name="template.AuctionTemplate"/>
	</agent>
</agents>
4. create tournament: java -jar 'logist/logist.jar' -new 'csptour' './agents'
5. run tournament: java -jar 'logist/logist.jar' -run 'csptour' 'config/auction.xml'
